description: Irregular triangular array T read by rows: T(i,0) = T(i,2i) = 1 for i >= 0; T(i,1) = T(i,2i-1) = floor(i/2) for i >= 1; and for i >= 2 and j = 2..2i-2, T(i,j) = T(i-1,j-2) + T(i-1,j-1) + T(i-1,j) if i+j is odd, and T(i,j) = T(i-1,j-2) + T(i-1,j) if i+j is even.
comments: Row sums are in A026597. - _Philippe Del√©ham_, Oct 16 2006T(n, k) = number of integer strings s(0)..s(n) such that s(0) = 0, s(n) = n-k, |s(i)-s(i-1)| <= 1 if s(i-1) odd, |s(i)-s(i-1)| = 1 if s(i-1) is even, for i = 1..n.
